title: Rishi Sunak – 2023 Remarks at the G7 Press Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Rishi Sunak, the Prime Minister, in Japan on 21 May 2023.
content:
Let me start by thanking Prime Minister Kishida and the people of Japan for their warm and generous welcome and hospitality.
